Synopsis:
It&#039;s Madame&#039;s Mansion and the mood is set for seduction.
Desperate husbands search for the perfect girl. 
These mistresses are here and indiscriminate. 
If the money&#039;s green, then you&#039;re just their type. 
But buyers beware, this house can suck you in.


From Dorcelshop:

Clara is one of Sylvie&#039;s best friends. Their special relationship goes as far as sharing the same boyfriend.

One day, Sylvie&#039;s aunty, Alice, whom everyone calls Madame since she&#039;s worked all her life in the haute-couture business, invites both girls to her manor house in the trendy Parisian suburbs. Once over there, Clara also meets up with Alice&#039;s husband, a lecherous man who lives off his wife&#039;s fortune whilst neglecting her sexually and who prefers paying whores.

In order to avenge Madame, our two young girls decide to give a good lesson to the man whilst pushing Alice into as many men&#039;s arms as possible. Follows a great succession of Champagne drinking and hot sex scenes that leaves Madame in a state of bliss.

An extremely immoral tale, `Madame` is a very well acted film in which female pleasure takes center stage. Various and repeated penetrations, sodomy and double penetrations succeed one to another with an unsurpassed intensity. 
A new Marc Dorcel production that Aphrodite would be proud of !



Category: 	Feature, Plot Based, Foreign
Director: 	Jorn Wolf
Studio: 	Marc Dorcel Productions
Release Date: 	Mar 02, 2006
